But he was pierced for our sins,crushed for our iniquity.
He bore the punishment that makes us whole,by his wounds we were healed. We had all gone astray like sheep, all following our own way; But the LORD laid upon him the guilt of us all. Isaiah 53; 5-6

RT @TXRightToLife Get egg-cited because Chip Roy is headed to the Republican Primary Runoff Election for Congressional District 21. Chip believes in the sanctity of human Life and will work to pass new Pro-Life laws! Early voting runs May 14-18. Runoff election day is May 22. @chiproytx #TXLege http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DZi5AH7VAAY6WZH.jpg

Ethiopian journalist Eskinder Nega, who was recently released after 7 years in prison on false charges, was just re-arrested. I urge the Ethiopian government to release him and other political prisoners. #expressionNOToppresion
https://apnews.com/99f0c8219c364222b071d48601175d06

Our hearts especially go out to those in the Texas Jewish community who are still rebuilding their homes, neighborhoods, synagogues, and community centers following the devastation of Hurricane Harvey.

It started in West Virginia. It continued into Oklahoma and it's now spreading to Arizona. Teachers are demanding respect for education and educators. They are standing up, fighting back – and making real progress. CHANGE IS COMING.
https://www.azcentral.com/story/news/politics/arizona-education/2018/03/28/arizona-teachers-demand-20-percent-raise-education-funding-governor-doug-ducey-legislature-redfored/462810002/

There's an overwhelming body of evidence that shows harsh disciplinary protocols in our schools disproportionately impact children of color. We have to make sure the solutions to the gun violence epidemic takes that into account. https://www.theroot.com/black-students-at-stoneman-douglas-want-gun-violence-so-1824188315

Another ugly side of the Iranian regime's egregious human rights abuses is its treatment of women. #expressionNOToppression
https://www.washingtonpost.com/news/global-opinions/wp/2018/03/28/irans-religious-police-promised-to-butcher-me-for-fighting-against-the-hijab/?elq=fa473e7d55e74848b9ee378d141cb950&elqCampaignId=23556&elqTrackId=f038f01025d34df58b3dc002c7f8a4fa&elqaid=38943&elqat=1&utm_term=.0299aea5f91d

Ben Carson is rolling back enforcement of fair housing practices. This is deeply alarming. There is real systemic racism and classism in our housing system. We must address it. No one should ever be denied housing because of their race or income status. https://www.nytimes.com/2018/03/28/us/ben-carson-hud-fair-housing-discrimination.html?smid=tw-share
How absurd is it that we live in a country where Congress and many states give huge tax breaks to billionaires and large corporations, but fail to provide adequate funding for education?
No one should have to choose between receiving quality healthcare and putting food on their table, a roof over their head, or retiring with dignity.
Nobody should have to work a job flipping burgers at 75 years old. Every American should be able to retire with dignity.

Wall Street greed and abuse crashed our economy in 2008. I will continue to fight against any legislation to deregulate the Big Banks and make it easier for them to crash it again.

All of you have shown tremendous resilience overcoming this adversity and continue to come together in support of one another. We will continue to stand with you as we work together to rebuild stronger and better than before.

A reminder about Trump’s budget: 

✂ Cuts Medicaid by $1.1 trillion
✂ Cuts Social Security by $72 billion
✂ Cuts Medicare by $266 billion

No one can argue that our nation is made stronger by cutting these priorities. Families and seniors would suffer. It is immoral.
